Articles.Content:
On 10/2/2012 at 11:18 AM, SteevyT said:

Here are mine pulled directly from the folders.

I am very interested to see a very Kerbal Christmas

Lately a lot of mine have been boring like 'Space Station Upgrade' and 'Rescue Pod'.  There's still a few highlights though.

  • Daredevil Pod -- heat shield, external seat, RCS, parachute, and nothing else.  It only saves $200 and a tiny bit of weight on a mk1 pod, though, leading to:
  • Hat Pod -- mk1 pod with parachutes, heatshield, and a radial RCS tank 'hat'.  I want to equip the space station with a few.
  • Muffin Man -- It's a suborbital missile.  Wordplay on the 'Minute Man' missile. 
  • Munbird -- big multipart moon rescue / satellite / lander mission.
  • Zombie Lander -- lopsided-looking and very minimal mun lander with materials bay
Edited July 16, 2016 by Corona688

For any craft: Goliaph, Barazoni, Bumblebee, Lighting, Thunder, Smartey.

For rovers: Cuber'o, Speedy.
